name: SOMweb
0:
”Alexa, open garage door”
”Alexa, close garage door”
”Alexa, what is the status of garage door?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Smart Home solution SOMweb allows you to control operators extremely simply via app from a smartphone or tablet. The data is safe, as it is not saved on external servers, but literally remains at home.

SOMweb device is required in order to control your SOMloq2 capable SOMMER garage door operator. The SOMweb may only be used on the operator in combination with a photocell.

Functions
- Open or close the door
- Query door status
- Up to ten operators can be controlled with one SOMweb.
- Video monitoring
- Includes user management and access control
- Real-time notification of door movements via app or e-mail.

For additional information and to check compatibility, visit www.som4.me/somweb

Get your smart garage today!
To use your SOMweb with Amazon Alexa, you need to first purchase and install a SOMweb . You can buy it at www.som4.me/somweb. Once you have your SOMweb installed, you can link it with Amazon Alexa.

Characteristics of this Skill:
You will be able to open and close your garage door connected to SOMweb and also ask Alexa the status of the garage door.

Linking requirements:
You will need your SOMweb UDI, username and password. The UDI can be found in Settings / Device in the SOMweb app. You can use both the "admin" username and any other user created on the device.
